fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a target, and an image of your choice. The host will post that image in the target's player channel without any context.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only communicate via images, even in your own private channel.
- Your images must not have any text on them. >:(

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make sure you successfully have a conversation with at least two people.
